reuters.title: COMMONWEALTH EDISON CO <CWE> 12 MONTHS NET
reuters.body: Period ended Feb 28 Shr 4.66 dlrs vs 4.40 dlrs Net 1,048,884,000 vs 959,626,000 Revs 5.43 billion vs 5.04 billion Avg shrs 200,242,000 vs 191,840,000 NOTE: Per-share earnings reflect payment of preferred dividend requirements Reuter 
